title: Seed box

properties.value: The seed box is an item that can store up to 2,147,483,647 seeds of six different types. It is purchased from Farmer Gricoller at the Tithe Farm for 250 points. This item cannot be used directly on a farming patch; players must remove the seeds they want to use in order to plant them. Players can right-click to open the box, which will have seeds that the player picks up be automatically placed inside the box, providing there is space for it.

SMW Subobject for ClosedHigh Alchemy value: 6Examine: A handy box for carrying some seeds.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Seed boxUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Seed box.pngWeight: 1.000Value: 10Version anchor: ClosedRelease date: 4 February 2016Item ID: 13639

The seed box is an item that can store up to 2,147,483,647 seeds of six different types. It is purchased from Farmer Gricoller at the Tithe Farm for 250 points. This item cannot be used directly on a farming patch; players must remove the seeds they want to use in order to plant them. Players can right-click to open the box, which will have seeds that the player picks up be automatically placed inside the box, providing there is space for it.

Like Gricoller's can, players can only own one seed box at a time. It is useful to bring to Slayer tasks and bosses which drop a large variety of seeds commonly, such as nechryael, to save inventory space. Ultimate Ironmen may find the seed box very useful, as it saves up to five inventory spaces while training Farming and Herblore.

The interface when checking the seed box.

Upon death to an NPC, including deaths below level 20 Wilderness, the seed box will go to the gravestone with all of its contents still stored. However, if the player dies above level 20 Wilderness, the seed box will be destroyed but the contents preserved within the next box acquired.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
14 April 2021
(update)

Upon death above level 20 wilderness the seed box will now be destroyed but its content preserved within the next box acquired.

16 April 2020
(update | poll)

Seeds pickpocketed from Master Farmers will now be directly placed into an open seed box.

23 January 2020
(update | poll)
  • Open and close options have been added, which allows seeds that the player picks up be automatically placed inside the box while opened, providing there is space for it.
  • The item's name was changed from "Seed box" to "Open seed box", while the closed version was given the open box's item name.
  • The item was graphically updated.
24 January 2019
(update)

Shift-clicking now empties the contents into the inventory.

14 April 2016
(update)

The "Check" and "Fill" options were swapped, so Fill is now left-click.

11 February 2016
(update)

The weight of the seed box was reduced from 6kg to 1 kg.

It is purchased from [[Farmer Gricoller]] at the [[Tithe Farm]] for 250 points. This item cannot be used directly on a [[Farming/Patch locations|farming patch]]; players must remove the seeds they want to use in order to plant them. Players can right-click to open the box, which will have seeds that the player picks up be automatically placed inside the box, providing there is space for it. Like [[Gricoller's can]], players can only own one seed box at a time. It is useful to bring to [[Slayer]] tasks and bosses which drop a large variety of seeds commonly, such as [[nechryael]], to save inventory space. [[Ironman Mode|Ultimate Ironmen]] may find the seed box very useful, as it saves up to five inventory spaces while training [[Farming]] and [[Herblore]].[[File:Seed box interface.png|thumb|left|The interface when checking the seed box.]] Upon death to an NPC, including deaths below level 20 [[Wilderness]], the seed box will go to the gravestone with all of its contents still stored. However, if the player dies above level 20 Wilderness, the seed box will be destroyed but the contents preserved within the next box acquired. == Shop locations == {{Store locations list}} ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 14 April 2021 |update = Below Ice Mountain |change = Upon death above level 20 wilderness the seed box will now be destroyed but its content preserved within the next box acquired. }} {{Subject changes |date = 16 April 2020 |update = Poll 70 Game Improvements |poll = Old School Content Poll 70: Game Improvements |change = Seeds pickpocketed from [[Master Farmer]]s will now be directly placed into an open seed box. }} {{Subject changes |date = 23 January 2020 |update = Wiki Integration |poll = Old School Content Poll 69: Game Improvements |change = *Open and close options have been added, which allows seeds that the player picks up be automatically placed inside the box while opened, providing there is space for it. *The item's name was changed from "Seed box" to "Open seed box", while the closed version was given the open box's item name. *The item was graphically updated. }} {{Subject changes |date = 24 January 2019 |update = Boxing Mechanics and Lots of Fixes |change = Shift-clicking now empties the contents into the inventory. }} {{Subject changes |date = 14 April 2016 |update = Bank Placeholders & PID |change = The "Check" and "Fill" options were swapped, so Fill is now left-click. }} {{Subject changes |date = 11 February 2016 |update = Tournament Stats & Skilling QoL |poll = |change = The weight of the seed box was reduced from 6kg to 1 kg. }} {{Subject changes footer}} ===Gallery (historical)=== {|style="text-align: center" cellpadding="15" |[[File:Seed box (v1) detail.png|center|300x150px]] |[[File:Seed box detail.png|center|300x150px]] |- |[[File:Seed box v1.png|center]] |[[File:Seed box.png|center]] |- |4 February 2016 –
